mapper.select: SELECT c.p_name AS "p_name", c.phone AS "phone" , c.image AS "image" , o.oid AS "oid", o.date AS "date", o.status AS "status" FROM sys_consultant c ,sys_order o WHERE c.pid = o.pid AND o.status=#{status}

SELECT c.p_name AS "p_name", c.phone AS "phone" , c.image AS "image" , o.oid AS "oid", o.date AS "date", o.status AS "status" FROM sys_consultant c ,sys_order o WHERE c.pid = o.pid AND (o.status=2 OR o.status=3)

SELECT c.p_name AS "p_name", c.phone AS "phone" , c.image AS "image" , o.oid AS "oid", o.date AS "date", o.status AS "status" FROM sys_consultant c ,sys_order o WHERE c.pid=o.pid AND o.status=0 AND o.date < #{date}

SELECT c.pid AS "pid", c.p_name AS "p_name", c.phone AS "phone", c.image AS "image" , o.oid AS "oid", o.date AS "date", o.status AS "status", o.remark AS "remark" ,u.uid AS "uid", u.realname AS "realname", u.weixin AS "weixin",u.qr_url AS "qr_url" ,u.nickname AS "nickname", u.phone AS "phone", u.company AS "company" ,u.position AS "position", u.headimgurl AS "headimageurl" FROM sys_consultant c ,sys_order o ,sys_user u WHERE c.pid=o.pid AND o.uid=u.uid AND o.oid=#{oid}
